lexUnit.name: evasive.a
lexUnit.definition: COD: tending to avoid commitment or self-revelation, especially by responding only indirectly.

sentence.text: Lydia was evasive , not having a good answer ready .
The evasive answers told her progress had been minimal , it was going to be some time before Emelda faced a press launch .
Undeterred by an evasive reply , he told me he could even provide a reliable guide who would conduct me across the border .
He upbraded Bray for his long-winded and evasive replies .
Hope had written an evasive reply which he would frank and give to George Wood to post for him but he doubted that he could deter him for much longer .
She was evasive when asked if she still felt like killing herself .
I thought Dieter seemed a bit evasive when Rose was questioning him . "
He was evasive about Rob too ; almost as if he had n't wanted to talk about him .
The woman who answered Bernadette 's ad for a childminder gave a false name , no proper address , was evasive about her phone number , and had no references .
` Elek is a very Persuasive and charming Central European -- or is he Hungarian ? -- and easy to work with , " Minton told her , ` except he 's rather evasive about the money . "
Bob was always evasive about Tessa , which made Jannie suspect that he might be serious about her .
The residential workers found him evasive in the account he gave of his actions and feelings .
` She 's evasive on the subject of Meryl Armitage , " contributed Allen .
I admit Victor is evasive at times , but we have known one another since early childhood , we are as close as brother and sister -- "
No , do n't try being evasive with me the way you were with the police , because it wo n't wash .
` I asked Nutty and she was very evasive .
You 're being evasive , I can feel it . "
A man who was so evasive , so totally uncaring of anyone 's feelings -- and what the hell had he meant about a relationship ?
The Minister 's answers are evasive .
The doctors were so evasive that it was impossible to get anything definite from them .
He was evasive and weak .
I see now why you were so evasive when I said I had n't power of attorney . "
